description: In this Provençal rendition of pan-cooked chicken breasts, the mushrooms take on and added dimension of flavor as they deglaze the pan with the help of one of their favorite partners, dry white wine.
title: Lemon and Garlic Chicken With Mushrooms
title_page: Lemon and Garlic Chicken With Mushrooms Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
In this Provençal rendition of pan-cooked chicken breasts, the mushrooms take on and added dimension of flavor as they deglaze the pan with the help of one of their favorite partners, dry white wine.
Featured in: One Chicken Breast, 2 Servings And Lots Of Vegetables.
